description: ff. 281. 212 x 153; 145 x 98 mm. 17 lin. Ramaḍān 1006; on the margins autograph glosses by ḥasan ibn ʻUthmān ibn Muḥammad al-Būsnawī. Brockelmann, GAL, II, 250 (commentary 4); S II, 263. Incip.: ... الحمد لله الحى الاحد

creator: Ibn Malak, ʻAbd al-Laṭīf ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz.
